abstract: Update: According to DealBook colleague Charles V. Bagli at City Room, while the Abu Dhabi fund will hold 75 percent of the Chrysler Building, that doesn’t mean control. Tishman Speyer Properties, a minority stakeholder in the skyscraper, controls the land beneath it. More here.
lead_paragraph: Update: According to DealBook colleague Charles V. Bagli at City Room, while the Abu Dhabi fund will hold 75 percent of the Chrysler Building, that doesn’t mean control. Tishman Speyer Properties, a minority stakeholder in the skyscraper, controls the land beneath it. More here.

headline.main: Abu Dhabi Fund Takes Big Stake in Chrysler Building
